column2: This character is distinguished by their unusual mental keenness and alertness.
This character is both more intelligent and cleverer than most.
This character quickly understands and overcomes mental challenges.
This character has been afflicted with below-average intelligence.
This character has questionable decision-making abilities.
This character shakes off wounds with a mere shrug.
This character is hardy and sturdily built.
This character is not the type suited for blood and glory.
This character has a fragile constitution and trouble with disease and wounds.
This character is famous for their beauty, many have difficulty averting their gaze.
This character is pleasing to the eye.
This character lacks any sort of attractive qualities.
Many are repulsed when glancing at this character.
This character is well-read in a wide-range of fields and is considered very educated.
This character has a rounded education and rapid wits.
This character has a fair education and is quick on the uptake.
This character is somewhat careless and inattentive.
This character has neglected study in favour of other pursuits.
This character seems to reject all common notions of learning.
This character has cast aside all thoughts of general study of any kind, and seems to know nothing in most fields.
This character is physically trained and in excellent shape.
This character exercises and is generally healthy.
This character neglects their physical well-being.
This character actively rejects exercise, and is consequently in poor shape.
This character is exquisitely well-dressed and takes great care of appearances.
This character takes care of their looks.
This character is rather careless of appearances.
This character seems almost to cultivate a poor appearance and off-putting manners.
